name: Defying Crate-vity
description:
Welcome to Defying Crate-vity! This is a short puzzle-platformer made for the 211th Weekly Game Jam. This was made in 72 hours and the theme is gravity.

Controls:

A/D and Left/Right arrows - Move around

Space - Jump

Click on crate - Flips its gravity

You can also push crates around!

I hope you enjoy!
